Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory723.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: "We're here again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "We're just going around in circles.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Spooner crushes the pebble he placed on the eaves himself two hours ago.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'The mountain trails here sure are... more complicated than they seem.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Your friend might be as lost as we are now on this mountain.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "But we haven't seen any trace of Yoyo for a while.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Over there! Hanying!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: "Following Spooner's finger, she sees it—over on the wooden passage just around the cliff, is the silhouette of a hunched-over figure."}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "We haven't met a single human since we entered this mountain.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'And one appears exactly when we find ourselves lost... What are the odds, huh? What do you think?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'This could very well be a trap set up by "The Cradle".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "But we've been going in circles on this mountain for a while without any lead.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "So are we going to give it a try now even if it's bait?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "You cannot get your hands on a tiger cub without entering the tiger's den.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'I don\'t quite understand that "Kowloong saying," but... Alright.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "I'll leave the talking to you. I still find it difficult to interact with humans.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Yet in the midst of their discussion, the hunchbacked old man walks straight past Spooner and Hanying as if he cannot see them.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Oh, oh! My apologies, my ears and eyes are failing me...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "I'm Mi Ku. Nice to meet you two.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Do you live on this mountain?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "You could say that. It's just a mountain with a tattered temple.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Could you tell us what exactly happened here? Do you know anything about "The Cradle"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'And have you seen a little girl...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'You sure have a lot of questions. Take it easy.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The old man brushes off some dirt on a rock nearby and leans against it.'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "We're still a distance away from the top of the mountain. It wouldn't hurt to take a break here.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: "Spooner grows alarmed hearing the old man's words."}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Wait... how did you know we were heading to the peak?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "I don't suppose my guess was wrong, though?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "That's where people go when they visit the mountain, and it's been that way since only heaven knows when.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "You have no reason to believe me, but I'll answer whatever questions you might have.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "...Well, here you go, Hanying. I'll be hanging around for recon. Hit me up if you ever need anything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'And people from Kowloong... sure have an interesting way with words.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Casting a look at Hanying, Spooner steps over to the other side of the passage.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "Hanying? That's a great name indeed. Now, let's see...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "What happened here up the mountain exactly? We haven't run into anyone but you the entire way coming up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "Well, let's just say some people showed up here uninvited.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'And I suppose that\'s "The Cradle"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Correct. They came a few decades ago and took over the mountain temple.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "The mountain temple had always been here, except they showed up—and I suppose the mountain temple will still be here in a few years when they're gone.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'You seem quite familiar with them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "Well, I've learned a few things here over the years as a janitor.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'And what I just told you, I learned them from people.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Is there anyone else here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Nope. All long gone.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "...I was just wondering if you'd ever seen a kid here, about 15 to 16 years old, wearing a white cape.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "I... don't think that's someone I'd describe as a kid.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "And I suppose you've seen her, then?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'I saw her a while back when she passed by in a rush leading a group of people.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Looking like a boss carrying a giant axe and all. Pretty sure that was her.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Says Mi Ku—as he points at the passage just behind the cliff.'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "...And I'm sure that was her because she was just like you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Like me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "Right—in that you're both trapped in the dark and throwing yourselves at fire.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'People are after the delusional wishes that "The Cradle" created, and the girl is after the delusional consequences "The Cradle" left in its wake.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "And you're no different...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'But I didn\'t come seeking any "delusion," though.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Is she whom you really came looking for?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Sticking his hand into the shade of the tree by a rock, Mi Ku comes up with an apple.'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Have you any idea why this mountain is called Mt. Huaiwu?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I... have no idea.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "The mountain didn't use to go by that name—until a little over a millennium ago when a poet by the name of Householder Changwu passed away here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Legend has it that she was just passing by when decided that this was where she was going to end her life.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'And so the mountain was named after her.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'But a name is just a name.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'What matters is what lies beneath.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Could you... shed some light on that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "There are things that even mankind struggles to wrap our heads around, and it'd be unreasonable to ask robots to do the same.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "Still, be it humans or mechanoids, we're all emotional beings that belong to the world.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'So there will come a day when we understand things that we once struggled to understand.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "Strange how there isn't a single apple tree here up on this mountain, no?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'With it, the man passes the apple in his hand to Hanying.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I'm sure it's tasty.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "Of course. It's fleshy, soft, and sweet.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'But... is this really an apple?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'It could be—well, it still is, at the very least.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Looking every bit as real as an actual apple and emitting a fresh fruity tang, the fruit shimmers with a tantalizing red.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory720.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory723.jpg'}

{3: 'But before she knows it, the apple, seemingly having defied all common senses, has grown into an enormous maple tree—before it wilts and shrinks into a tiny little seed, all in the blink of an eye, and lies quietly in her hand.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Wait, I don't... This is impossible. Is this some sort of illusion?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Birth and death—everything there is in this world experiences the cycle.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "But it doesn't happen at this speed in the real world, which means...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'This is all a dream.', 4: '1'}
{3: "With Hanying's eyes upon him, the man, without saying a word, looks back at her with a gentle smile."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'But how did I even get here without picking up a single sign...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Wait, is it because of "The Cradle"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'That would be correct.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'And I take it that the same happened to Yoyo, too?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'She passed by here three days ago, taking the path right up ahead.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Without getting lost?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: '"They" seemed very interested in her, so they drew her toward the peak with a very straightforward path.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: '"They" as in "The Cradle"?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The man shakes his head, not answering Hanying's question."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Well... is there a way I can find her and leave this place, then?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "That's where people go when they visit the mountain, and it's been that way since only heaven knows when.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "Past the peak, you'll find the answers you need to all the questions you have.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Can I help you with anything else?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'What are you going to do?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Me? Well, what exactly do you think this old man is going to do?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "We came across nothing but modified mechanoids the entire way, and we didn't see a single human being until we met you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'And granted that this was all a dream, why are you telling me all this, though?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Can I... really trust you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "That's for you to decide.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Truth is but in the eye of the beholder—for a rose, by any other name, would smell just as sweet...', 4: '2'}
{3: "The man reaches for the seed in Hanying's hand and takes it."}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "Let me keep this seed for you for now. We'll cross paths again.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'And here "they" are...', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 3: '2'}
{3: "The old man's body begins to digitalize—"}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiGuanbixiaoshi.prefab', 2: '2', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 3: "Having been keeping an eye on the scene this entire time, Spooner wastes no time rushing up to Hanying—except when he gets there, the man who's been sitting on the rock is now nowhere to be seen."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiGuanbixiaoshi.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "I'm fine, Spooner.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Totally knew we were up against something!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "This place... isn't real, if what the man said was true.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'What do you mean?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Showed me that what happens here can go beyond our understanding of how things work in the real world...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'And that we might have walked right into this trap that "The Cradle" set up from the get-go without knowing it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "And I gather that means we're in some sort of virtual world?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I know how crazy that sounds, but I think that's what's happening.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'There is no way to prove one way or the other, though!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'I mean, if this entire thing has been a trap from the get-go...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Then this is probably a place where reality and virtuality blend into each other, like in a dream.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "Does it count as a dream, though? Because, theoretically speaking, mechanoids don't dream.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Our neural circuit that runs on minimum power is the closest thing we have to what a human would call a "dream."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Have you never had a dream?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Never.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I\'d been in one myself—until "Sage" woke up me from it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'And all those days that Yoyo and I spent together on the Nighter seem like a dream to me from yesterday.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "Mechanoids and dreaming. Now, that's unheard of.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Everything seemed real in that dream I was in.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'And I probably knew that it was just a dream somewhere deep down.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Still... I wasn't able to wake myself up from it. Well, I guess it's more like I didn't want to wake up from it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: '...Had you ever seen Sage before then? Or any of her work?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Never. The only thing I\'d heard about her was that she was able to enlighten mechanoids and give us what they call a "heart."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Which means you awoke solely by living with that little girl—without having ever met Sage.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "Mankind's records say that dreams show one's consciousness very vividly.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'It\'s only when a machine has awakened that it becomes aware of the "self"— and with that realization comes consciousness.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'And that "consciousness," in other words, is the "heart."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'So that... is the "heart."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'You\'re the first one I came across at the Church that describes their consciousness as "dreams"...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "And it's something we've only heard a handful of times even from Sage herself...", 4: '2'}
{3: "Spooner's words seem to be pointing at only one thing now..."}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'And if you truly had awakened by that point... then that\'s when you had a "heart."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "That's what Cervantes said to me, too, back at the Church.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Except... I have no idea how to prove that, and Arcana had no way to prove this part that they call the "heart."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "Or... maybe that's not something that needs to be proven to begin with.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Spooner shakes his head in confusion.'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "I haven't quite wrapped my head around all of these just yet.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'But... do you trust the man?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'For what it\'s worth, he might have just been something that "The Cradle" tried to bait us with.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I don't think he's a fabulist... given his peaceful and insightful tone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'And there was something he intentionally left unspoken throughout the entire conversation—all while we both knew perfectly well that he was withholding something.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Strange indeed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: '"The Cradle" could have just turned this place into a maze and never let us leave, had they really wanted us to suffer.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Except the man said, "Truth is but in the eye of the beholder."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'And that, to me, sounded like we could make our way out of here with whatever path we think would be able to get us out of here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "And that's all we need to do... to get out of here? I mean, that sounds almost too easy to me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "If we really are in a dream, then I guess it won't hurt to try to get a little more imaginative...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Where is the path we were just on?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'This way, along the cliff and to the left.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Taking a step forward, Hanying sets foot again on the same passage she's been through only way too many times."}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "We've been through that path countless times already.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Let's just give it one more try.", 4: '1'}
